coding_practice.title: Maximum Subarray
coding_practice.description: Given an integer array nums, find the subarray with the largest sum, and return its sum.

examples.explanation: The subarray [4,-1,2,1] has the largest sum 6.
The subarray [1] has the largest sum 1.
The subarray [5,4,-1,7,8] has the largest sum 23.

coding_practice.follow up: If you have figured out the O(n) solution, try coding another solution using the divide and conquer approach, which is more subtle
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 初始化 max_current 和 max_global 為 nums[0]。
2. 遍歷陣列從第二個元素開始：
   2.1 max_current = max(num, max_current + num) 決定是否從當前元素重新開始子陣列。
   2.2 如果 max_current > max_global，更新 max_global。
3. 遍歷完成後返回 max_global。
4. 複雜度分析：
   4.1 時間複雜度：O(n)
   4.2 空間複雜度：O(1)
